Package com.openclassrooms.paymybuddy.service

Interface BankAccountService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BankAccountServiceImpl
    @Service
public interface BankAccountService
    Service Interface for managing user's bank accounts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      BankAccountDto addToUser​(int userId, BankAccountDto account)
      Add a bank account to the user according to the data sent in the form of a DTO and persist it in the database.
      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<BankAccountDto> getAllFromUser​(int userId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get a page of the list of all bank accounts of the user in the form of DTO.
      void removeFromUser​(int userId, int id)
      Remove a bank account from the user by its id and delete it from the database.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllFromUser

        org.springframework.data.domain.Page<BankAccountDto> getAllFromUser​(int userId,
                                                                    org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
                                                             throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Get a page of the list of all bank accounts of the user in the form of DTO. The pagination doesn't handle sorting.
        Parameters:
        userId - of the user
        pageable - for the requested page
        Returns:
        Page of BankAccountDto
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found

      • addToUser

        BankAccountDto addToUser​(int userId,
                         BankAccountDto account)
                  throws ResourceNotFoundException,
                         ResourceAlreadyExistsException
        Add a bank account to the user according to the data sent in the form of a DTO and persist it in the database.
        Parameters:
        userId - of the user
        account - data of the bank account to create
        Returns:
        BankAccountDto of the created bank account
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found
        ResourceAlreadyExistsException - if bank account already exists

      • removeFromUser

        void removeFromUser​(int userId,
                    int id)
             throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Remove a bank account from the user by its id and delete it from the database.
        Parameters:
        userId - of the user
        id - of the bank account
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user or account not found
